title: Improve UX regarding Default Inheritance
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
**Context:**
The user would like to set default inheritance settings so that new connections always inherit the username, password, and domain from it's parent.

**User Journey:**
1. Left click the **Connections** tree node
1. Click the **Default Inheritance** button at the top of the config window.
1. Set the appropriate inheritance values to `Yes`
